website_summaries.verdict: One of the most affordable laminators by a top-selling brand in office equipment.
pros: Heats  up in just a few minutes
cons: Although rated to accommodate pouches up to 5 mil, it struggles a bit with those over 3 mil

customer_reviews.title: Does very well
customer_reviews.text: I have used the Fellowes Spectra 95 a few times now. This laminator does very well with the 3mil pouches however when I use the 5 mil (as I needed for ID badges) I find that I have to put the pouch through twice. Also no carrier is needed but for the smaller pouches I managed to rig a carrier so it would not get stuck in the laminator.
customer_reviews.author: Ladyearl

customer_reviews.title: Great Price
customer_reviews.text: For the price, it works well for a small job. For larger jobs, you might a better laminator
customer_reviews.author: Gail Wiggins-Moton

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's a perfect size and I am extremely happy with the quality of it. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: marking pen

customer_reviews.title: Not happy.
customer_reviews.text: It broke the first day, and I have no idea how to return it. Not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, I have only used it a couple times but I am happy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Umm
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product used. Said condition was “good” and only had “cosmetic imperfections” It came with an attempted laminated paper stuck inside!
customer_reviews.author: Madison

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect. A huge smooch to the engineers. No Instructions Needed!
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product because I had the same one for years and the first time I used it, the paper got jammed and I could not use it. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Svenzig

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: very ice and everything came on time and as expected Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Go ahead and get this one!
customer_reviews.text: Great little laminator. You can't go wrong at this price.
customer_reviews.author: Davis M.

customer_reviews.title: Love this laminator
customer_reviews.text: Love this laminator! It's small and fast and works just as good as laminators that I've spent much more on in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Dow

customer_reviews.title: Slow and cheap. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: slow and cheap. Rollers stopped working after 6 weeks. I used it 5 times and ran a total of approximately 30 sheets through it. Tried to use it tonight, and no roller action. Cheap Chinese Garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Eric G.

customer_reviews.title: I was disappointed, i gave this as a gift to my ...
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed, i gave this as a gift to my daughter. When she plugged it in, it did not work. She had to go through the trouble to get it replaced. The new one works.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Works great for small use.
customer_reviews.text: No issues yet! Have used it a handful of times for my toddler (Preschool at home). Easy to use and very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Fellowes Spectra 95 Laminator with Pouch Starter Kit
product_meta.description: A great machine for quick and easy laminating! The Spectra 95 Laminator has a 9-1/2 inch entry width to accommodate multiple document sizes and can laminate documents and photos up to 5mil. An auto-shutoff mode ensures that this laminator is energy efficient as well as convenient. With a 4-minute warmup time and a release lever for re-centering or removal, this machine is ideal for your home or home office.
feature_bullets: User-friendly laminator for the home or home office
9-1/2" entry width accommodates multiple document sizes
Release lever disengages pouch for re-centering or removal

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars39 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
